creation.title: Creating a Place
creation.description: Creating a new Place is an opportunity to talk about a visited object. Here you can add a description, attach photos, and also indicate the type, location and address

edit.title: Editing a Place
edit.description: After editing, the Place will be sent for moderation.

1.title: Description
1.description: Enter the title and describe the place you visited.
1.placeDescriptionInfo: A few sentences briefly describing the tourist site. Detailed information is indicated in the corresponding Note.
1.placeWebsiteDescription: Indicate the website of this place or attraction (optional)

2.title: Categories
2.tooltip: The type and categories are needed to correctly search for your place on our site, you can always change them in your personal account
2.commercialHelper: To publish a commercially oriented object (an estate, an exhibition, a museum, a hotel, etc.) on the website for advertising purposes, select this option.
2.placeCategoriesDescription: Select the categories to which the place belongs to

3.title: Photos
3.description: Upload up to {{limit}} photos taken at this location in jpg, jpeg, png format.

4.title: Address
4.description: t this stage, you need to enter the address of the given location. In addition, you can find it on the map and indicate the exact coordinates.
4.addressPlaceholder: Belarus, Grodno region, Smorgon district, Krevo village...
4.mapTitle: Check if the map shows the correct location
4.mapDescription: The Place coordinates are automatically recognized depending on the entered address. If necessary, you can move the marker on the map or specify the exact coordinates
4.coordinatesDescription: You can specify the coordinates of a location if you know them. Latitude is specified first, then longitude.

update.success: The Place has been updated and sent for moderation. You can see its status in your personal account

create.success: The Place has been created and sent for moderation. You can see its status in your personal account
